data.title: National Federation of Women's Institutes
data.lede: *NFWI* was one of my favourite projects to work on while I was at *Squiz*—I worked on the HTML and CSS side of the front-end as well as doing some work for *NFWI’s* authors in the CMS.

data.title: One Housing
data.lede: *One Housing* was a project while I was at *Squiz* where I really got to put my knowledge of CSS to the test, so I worked hard to produce a robust framework that was part of the foundation of further front-end development in the *One Housing* network of sites.

data.title: Clearing at City, University of London
data.lede: The pressure was truly on with this project at *City*; we had a relatively short amount of time to turn around a robust, multi-view website to handle the universities entire Clearing period. I was in charge of implementing a lightweight and maintainable design system and contributed towards the Node.js app that handled everything in the background.
